name: ledScreen.scrollString
content: Will make text, numbers and punctuation appear on the LED screen. The text will scroll from left to right. In order to be displayed on the LEDs text must be placed inside of quotation marks.

examples.name: Name Badge
examples.description: Create a name tag using the ledscreen.scrollString(string) to display your name on the LED Screen

examples.name: Are you Happy or Sad?
examples.description:
Respond with how you are feeling using worlds and/or symbols to display text to represent the emotions your are feeling. 

- Button A → Happy :) 
- Button B → Sad :(

palette_params.name: String
palette_params.description: Use letters, numbers, and punctuation inside of quotes to display on LED screen

short_description: Displays a scroll of Letters, numbers, and punctuation
tips: Must place text inside of “ “ in order to display on screen
